CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc. Common Shares

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 481 BRASSARD STREET, SAINT-MICHEL-DES-SAINTS, Quebec, J0K 3B0, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Nouveau Monde Graphite Inc is a mineral exploration company. The company only operating segment is the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mining properties and all of its activities are conducted in Quebec, Canada. Its property includes Matawinie mining project. The company's products are used in Metallurgy, Energy and Engineering materials sector.
